typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		Name as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(CountryRegionCode),
	each(match(name!='CountryRegionCode'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggregateDistinct
source1 aggregate(groupBy(CountryRegionCode),
	Name = last(Name),
		ModifiedDate = last(ModifiedDate)) ~> Aggregate1
